website_summaries.verdict: A squeaky-clean foaming cleanser that feels soft to the touch and is also easy on the pocketbook.
pros: For less than $10, one can foam up and in moments, have healthy feeling skin
Infused with rice extracts, this cleanser is creamy to the touch and gentle in application
cons: Dryness may occur as this product is not formulated with water-binding agents

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleanser solely because it had listed that their ingredients DO NOT have sulfates. This is personally significant because I can not use any products containing either sulfates or parabens, as I have eczema and both of those components immensley irritate my skin. I read over the ingredients of the product once I had recieved it to double check, and what do you know...it contains sodium lauryl sulfate! This particular product is suppsoedly not returnable either. I’m extremely disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Good product and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The product is creamy and gently cleanses without stripping my skin. It can be a tad drying. Since I make my own moisturizer using essential oils, shea butter, and coconut oil I was able to adjust the richness of my moisturizer and that took care of the dryness. I really love the product. This facial cleanser is a good product and at a great price. I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Fair-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels stripped dry, and is breaking out
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well for me. It leaves my skin feeling really dry and has left me with breakouts like I used to get in high school! It feels like it strips my skin of its natural oils, and my skin is not happy with it. I stopped using it a few days ago, and it’s starting to get better. I’m really unhappy that I can’t return it for a refund! I’ll go back to buying skin care from Sephora or Ulta where I can at least get a refund if I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bates

customer_reviews.title: I think I’m in love
customer_reviews.text: package came in protective plastic and with a protective plug over the opening, packaging is overall very nice and quality, which I appreciate and the bottle is bigger than I expected. it smells really nice and has a pearlescent look to it which is pretty and also reminds me of higher quality. it also foams up really nice and leaves my skin so soft and moisturized and a little goes a long way. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, not harsh on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it doesn't clean off most make up. I don't wear a lot of heavy makeup. My cover up is from the Body Shop. I still have to use a make-up wipe to clean off most of the makeup. I've used it in this order 1) Face shop oil cleanser 2) Face Shop foaming facial cleanser 3) makeup wipe. Between the oil cleanser and the foaming facial cleanser I would say it takes off about 50% of the cover up. It doesn't melt the makeup away. I've seen youtube videos of other cleansers that seem to really disintegrate the makeup even before rinsing off the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ldymomo69

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product yesterday and used it for the first time last night. The first thing I noticed was how well packaged it was. Not only was it shrink wrapped in plastic but there was a seal on the product as well making it extra secure and tamper proof. The second thing that hit me was the smell once I opened it. It smells amazing. It has a thick consistency and lathered up well too. Immediately after using it my face felt super smooth and clean. I woke up this morning with a well moisturized and smooth complexion. And this was just after one use! So far so good. Can't wait to see how this performs over time.
customer_reviews.author: TSEN

customer_reviews.title: Not my thing, its alright overall.
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser strips oils from your face, it leaves your skin feeling squeaky clean if that's something you're looking for then this is for you. Unfortunately, its something I'm not into, I prefer cleansers that leave my face feeling soft and moisturized rather than dry and clean as if I'd washed with body soap. It also burns A LOT if you get it in your eyes or any open acne. Personally, I wouldn't buy again but it arrived on time and packaged nicely, its also a very pretty looking packaging and the cleanser itself is very pretty almost shiny and glittery but doesn't actually have any glitter or shine.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I have such a hard time finding products that actually work and that I stick with. On the first use I knew this would be something I would be buying time and time again. I use this after my oil based cleanser and it does wonders. My face feels so clean without that dried out feeling after using. A little goes a long way with this cleanser which I love. This has became a staple in my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Over a year of using this product and I’m still happy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for awhile now, I think I’ve gone through 3 and a half tubes at this point and I am very happy with the results! I have very dry skin, but this has not dried me out at all! It leaves my skin feeling really clean and refreshed. It has also helped brighten my skin. Plus if you use it in conjunction with a konjac sponge your skin will be very soft! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Good facial cleanser but keep it AWAY from your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the way my skin feels after using this cleanser but be very careful using it on the eye area to remove eye makeup because if you get ANY of it in your eye it burns and won't quit. I shut my eyes tightly when rinsing and did not put any product on the eyelids but my eyes hurt all night long and are still watering and burning this morning. Very painful and my eyes are scratchy and watering constantly like something is in them. Do not use this product to remove eye makeup for sure. It takes very little too, I learned after the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This foams easily. The foam is thick and smooth. Feels like liquid silk. I love the smell. I'm very sensitive to smells in personal care products, and this is the most pleasant smell I have ever had in a soap. I use a lot of sunscreen due to hiking in Arizona. When I wash my face with this soap, it cleans off everything in one go, no need for a second wash to make sure everything is off my face. My face somehow looks and feels stripped of dirt but not tight, not ashy, and doesn't look or feel dry. I've used it for months now, and my skin definitely looks clearer and I've had no breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Emery Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, mild formula so it's perfect for washing your face in the mornings or evenings when you stay home and don't wear makeup. You can use it on days you wear makeup, but you'll want to use a good makeup remover first, especially for eye makeup. It doesn't strip skin or make it feel taught, so I've really enjoyed using it for the last year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Lovely light scent, works wonders for my combination / sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin that is also quite sensitive and acne prone. This cleanser is very light and feels lovely on my skin, and it's one of the few that I have found that doesn't dry me out or irritate me. It's not too stripping because of how natural it feels on the skin and it's just the type of cleanser I was looking for that fits my skin type! A little goes a long way with this cleanser and it has definitely helped my acne and even my uneven tones (a bit) after using it for quite a few months. Once I run out of this I plan on ordering their cleansing oil as well
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: poor product, not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought several "affordable" Korean skincare products with high ratings here on Amazon and this one was disappointing. I don't know how you can ruin a foaming cleanser but this doesn't work at all. I'm shocked the ratings are so high. Unfortunately I think you just have to spend a decent amount of money for skincare. Cheap products are full of cheap ingredients that won't give you the results you want.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a different face wash and decided to give this a try since it's made with "rice". The smell was nice but I don't think a face wash should have that much perfume in it (in my opinion). Used it almost every day and it made the parts around my nose and cheeks even worse. I am now getting dry patches even after using a serum and moisturizer right after. I have discontinued use of it. It just didn't work for my face. Doesn't necessarily mean it won't work on others. I have dry skin and sensitive skin just an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Famkee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would leave my skin feeling clean and refreshed, but it felt like it didn't clean at all, and then left a residue on my skin. My face broke out with pimples within the first week. It's very thick, like toothpaste. It foams up after some agitation with water and feels very soft on the face. It feels like it deposits oils and moisture and that's it. I would return it if I could
customer_reviews.author: Launie K.

customer_reviews.title: So thankful I found this cleanser! You must try it! Love Love Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! After Clarisonic shut down their business, I could not find a face wash I liked to replace the “Clarisonic Radiance foaming milk cleanser”. I was so upset and my face started breaking out like I was a teenager! I could tell my skin wasn’t getting a deep clean and it didn’t feel polished. Until I used the Rice Water cleaner for the 1st time.. my skin felt soft, moisturized and CLEAN! A little bit goes a long way too. I use it on my Clarisonic brush for a deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve found my holy grail, but YMMV.
customer_reviews.text: These are my experiences with this product; everyone’s skin is different so YMMV. I’ve tried more cleansers over the years than I can count. I know the COSRX Good Morning cleanser is super popular, and I tried it and that’s how I found out my skin does not like tea tree. I decided to give this a try because it’s a bit more gentle and didn’t include any ingredients that I know I respond badly to. That was two years ago and since then it’s the only cleanser I’ve purchased, and I’ll continue to purchase it until it’s discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: KKL

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: The first photo shows before and after (bottom). After using some products it opened up my pores, made me break up and caused more damage and dents on my skin. I started using this and my pores started to closed up again. I have oily to combination skin and the scents smells nice, im not breaking out anymore AND I noticed my face has brighten a lot. I liked this product so much I even bought their face mask and it feels amazing. I would recommend it to oily to combination only because it can feel drying.
customer_reviews.author: Chy

customer_reviews.title: I love this gentle cleanser and use it every morning and ...
customer_reviews.text: Now on my 3rd tube. I love this gentle cleanser and use it every morning and every night. Initially I was taken aback by the scent (I have issues with perfume) but after a few days I realized I really like the smell - it is a very nice clean smell that I don't mind having on my face and hands after washing. I have normal to dry skin. In the winter it was not drying yet this summer I also feel like my face is getting really clean after a day of sweating in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't even take off make up!! Dried out my skin and actually made it red and itchy!! I do not have sensitive skin either!! The worst part is that this product is not returnable!! It's probably not the real product!! Garbage at best!! Gotta love all the fake reviews because I can't see how anybody would rate this to be a good facial cleanser!!
customer_reviews.author: smartone

customer_reviews.title: So Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Just wow, the first time I used it I looked in the mirror and you could see a huge difference right it away. It really is brightening. It also get's rid of any make-up residue and leaves your face feeling really soft and "sqweaky-clean." Literally. I haven't tried very many cleansing foams but I don't think I'm going to buy others in a hurry. I'm pretty happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin, heavy ordor
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product for sensitive or eczema skin, the scent alone is very strong, very perfumey/floral was really surprised by smell. I did like the feel of it but it dried out my face and requires a moisturizer. My face is started to break out in acne and redness after about 2 weeks of usage. I'll be discontinuing the use of the product
customer_reviews.author: Zayla

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying out a few different Asian face washes, and I found the first couple dried me out horribly (for anyone interested, they were Skinfood Egg White Pore Foam and Holika Holika Aloe Vera face wash). I switched over to this face wash and my skin’s back to normal now! I didn’t change anything else in my skincare routine, so it had to be the face washes that were drying. This one comes in a handy squeeze tube, is inexpensive, and the scent is light and pleasant. I’m adding this to my list of skincare that I love!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CLEANSER EVER USED
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser I've ever used . I'm never going back to no other cleanser but this one leaves your skin soft and supple also super bright and clean it doesnt leave it dry like other facial cleansers and the product itself is thick and creamy so a little goes a long way and it has the best scent ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Gamon

customer_reviews.title: I've found a new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facewash. This is my new daily cleanser, my skin felt cleaner afterward than with anything else ive tried. Its also helped calm my pregnancy acne, which is hard to treat because many products are unsafe. This is great, foams like crazy so i only need a tiny pea sized amount for a full face of makeup. It also smells freakin amazing so I feel really luxurious when i use it.
customer_reviews.author: JB550

customer_reviews.title: Its like the most average product I have ever used!!!! Nothing bad about it but nothing great either
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading great reviews and honestly was quite excited. I have been using it for 6 months now and honestly I see no difference in my skin. Its the same and the only reason I am using it because it just does not get over and I am someone who does not like to waste products unless they cause a bad reaction. This one has caused no break outs, rash or anything negative at all but I would not buy it. It has not brightened my skin as it claims to. Not something I would repurchase or recommend. Smells good and lathers well!!!
customer_reviews.author: DrNS

customer_reviews.title: BEST. CLEANSER. EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser ever. It gets everything off and doesn’t have a strong perfume smell. It makes your face feel soft and clean! You may get a couple pimples as your face adjusts for the first week or so but keep at it and you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yullhae Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in conjunction with Korean Skin Care Snail Repair Cream (by SeolCeuticals) for a month and my face is so soft. Normally I have random middle-aged breakouts, but I haven't had any. Plus my nose and chin are normally reddish, but that too has all but gone away. I am absolutely hooked and will continue this regimen. The product is not heavy and has a pleasant smell and texture. Rice water - who knew?!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Immediately reduced facial redness on my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so sensitive even touching it with water and my hands can make it red for an hour but immediately after rinsing this off my face was calmed and all the redness from my hot shower was gone! I bought this because it was recommended for sensitive, inflamed skin and to reduce this all-over red/pinkness my fair skin gets, and this works like a dream. The scent reminded me of something my grandma would use but it works so well I don't even care!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Basic gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I don't use much face makeup so I can't comment on makeup removal. This doesn't strip my skin, but doesn't leave residue either. It doesn't help with blackheads or pimples whatsoever. But it's a very good basic cleanser, which are pretty hard to find these days. Foams well, and doesn't sting my eyes when I use it like normal. A very good option for angry skin. I will play around with other gentle cleansers since I don't like the brightening effect of this one (which is a plus in a lot of people's books), but I'm willing to stick with it in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction!! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My face is not sensitive but I Had allergic reaction that lasted days. Can’t even return it. Not sure what chemical they put into it. My face had little bumps all over like chicken skin. Worse experience ever!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Read Review Before Buying
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize the ingredient contained sodium lauryl sulfate! Known to be linked with "cancer, neuro/organ toxicity, skin irritation and as an endocrine disruptor! I've been more aware of ingredients in cosmetics and food nowadays. I threw this product straight to the trash. I thought i was saving money, but i lost money instead! Not compromising my skin or health for $10!
customer_reviews.author: Errol

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this. Hopefully my results continue and if they ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this. Hopefully my results continue and if they don't I will update. I have used this twice so far already with a noticeable difference. I generally have good skin but lately I have been noticing irritation and dry patches with my face washes (Ive used a few different ones). I used this once and my skin was not red at all after rinsing which it usually is, and even my small pimple spots were smooth and lighter. This is NOT whitening (thank god) but it's definitely brightening. My skin seems very happy with this product and I hope it continues. I am considering buyng the rest of the rice water line from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Msobai

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best face wash I’ve EVER used. It has not only cleared up my skin, it has dramatically brightened acne scars, visibly reduced pore size, improved it’s texture, and leaves my skin feeling so soft and healthy. I struggled for years trying to achieve glass-like skin in the face of stress acne until I tried this. I’ve tried several expensive, luxury face washes and this is by far my favorite. Thank you for formulating such an excellent product. This is a holy grail face wash and I couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have unbelievably dry skin in the winter and this has been saving me for almost a month now. I wash my face at night but occasionally get the time to do it in the morning. It has helped a ton. My skin feels soft, refreshed and is looking great. I also noticed I haven't had any break outs. I noticed after about two weeks of using it that my pimple prone areas are super clear!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Face Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for awhile and I love it. The scent isn't too strong and it's very gentle on my skin. It has kept my skin clear. I bought product for my boyfriend too and he has cystic acne. He really loves it. His acne has cleared up so much and it doesn't dry out his skin. I assigned this product with his daily Asian skincare. He says this was his favorite product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: Foams up great, and the smell is just fine. It honestly reminds me of Clinique's rinse off foaming cleanser which I love. The only problem is it BURNS the eyes. The directions do state, do not get near eyes...however, that is not always an easy task when washing your face. I prefer a cleanser that I can use on my eye makeup and face.
customer_reviews.author: Jamz

customer_reviews.title: This has been wonderful for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, oily skin and everything causes me to break out. I use a gentle face brush to wash my face with this and it has been wonderful at cleaning my skin. The scent isn't anything too overpowering and I usually hate scented stuff. It cleans really well, I use toner after each time I wash and the toner doesn't ever get any additional dirt.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Late in the game
customer_reviews.text: So..I’ve very recently started venturing out and trying Korean products. I’ve been basically a Sephora gal for years, buying Kate Somerville products religiously and I love the Sephora brand as well, but my sister gifted some hand cream recently & I absolutely love the smell, texture and non greasy formula. I saw this product and decided to give it a try. My face smelled amazing, it did not strip my face but gave me a fresh and clean feeling! I will be buying again &. Again! Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii50

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Was pleasantly surprised. Will be my face wash from now on.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face wash. It is gental. Leaves my face super soft. A little goes a long way, which I like. It take all my make up of quick and easy. The sent is very very light. I can't tell if it's really "brightening" my skin but my completion is more even and I no longer have occasional breakouts. I really wasn't sure what to expect, and all the writing on the bottle is in Korean (maybe Mandarin, not sure) but I am very happy and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan W.

customer_reviews.title: Brightening, brightening, brightening!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is sensitive and oily and this is not aggravating at all. You need so very little of this cleanser to create a powerful lather. Although I oil cleanse, this cleanser is efficient enough to do the job alone. I don't think I've ever used a face wash this gentle and thus level of profound brightening properties.
customer_reviews.author: I.Am.Her

customer_reviews.title: A pea sized amount goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I was using a face wash from Sprouts for the past 12 years. As I have aged it got too strong for me and it was giving me red cheeks. I have had this brand now for a few weeks and I keep it in the shower. A small amount goes a long way. It cleans well because when I use toner afterwards I don't see any makeup traces. It doesn't remove mascara - so you will still need eye make up remover. It does leave a slight tightness to my face feeling but it isn't a drying feeling. So far so good it's working out.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieLovesOrbit

customer_reviews.title: The Best Face Wash on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 4th time ordering this face wash. I absolutely love it. A little goes a long way when you are using this product and you don't have to work about it stripping your face because it is moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Dexrala

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered sixth tube
customer_reviews.text: Just reordered my sixth or seventh tube of this stuff which is REALLY FAIRLY PRICED, and compared with MANY other, often more expensive products claiming to be good on sensitive skin—all always leave me with feeling of “raw face,” unlike this one which isn’t harsh at all but is just soap enough to get rid of excess sebum.
customer_reviews.author: Asstor Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: It’s no joke
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best and the most enjoyable part of my routine. I use this after I use my gel cleanser and it so relaxing to apply and massage. But most importantly it does what it’s suppose to. It really leaves your face feeling clean before toning and calms down redness (which is one of my struggles). Also, it’s helping out with the acne scars I had with every use. It’s amazing and I’m so happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and moisturizes nicely
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a nice vanilla lavender. I love how it makes my skin feel afterwards. With a lot of face wash it ends up dry and tight, but my skin feels moisturized after using this stuff. I originally bought it with the matching face oil, but found this still does a great job of cleaning and moisturizing that I didnt feel I needed to use the oil anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered this product, i honestly didn't have very high hopes for it. I must say i have VERY dry skin and finding a good product that moisturizes has always been a challenge. However, I do think this product has improved my skin. I honestly don't use it daily but when i do, right after I wash my face it doesn't feel as dry but that feeling doesn't last too long. Overall, if you are good at following routines, give it a shot, you might get good results
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Bulkley

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second time!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it removes makeup really well, I’m not a huge fan of the fragrance as I tend to go for unscented things but it’s not like it smells bad. Leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed and gets all the oil and dirt off because when I use my toner nothing comes off on the cotton pads!! This stuff is so worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Wesolowski

customer_reviews.title: If youre debating, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than my old cleanser, yet works better. This cleanser made my face feeling clean, yet soft and not dry. Smells a bit like baby shampoo though which can be a good or bad thing depending on your preferences. I didn't particularly mind, and the scent didn't linger in my face. (Though it did linger in my bathroom lol) And you get a pretty good amount of product! And a little surprisingly goes a long way. I can squeeze out a dime size amount and have it cover my whole face.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is very gentle as advertised. However, it does not remove makeup very well and burns really bad if it goes anywhere near your eyes. It's also very thick and does not lather at all. I switched to a more expensive, but effective morning cleanser (glossier milky jelly) for an easy moisturizing cleanser. It just takes a lot of work to move it around the face and then to wash it all off.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Really nice soothing face wash
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I have been using the rice water cleansing oil for months now and decided to try this after finishing our regular foaming face wash. We really like it. Definitely nice for sensitive skin. If you have dry skin (like me), I wouldn't suggest it for really cold/dry climates. It's not moisturizing enough. But for a spring to summer? It's perfect! If you have normal/combo/oily skin it's definitely worth a try. Probably good for all seasons too.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Consistently happy results
customer_reviews.text: I don't plan on ever changing the face cleaner I use. I hate it when I get out of the shower and it feels like my face has been stripped of all of its natural moisture. My face feels clean and a little tight but nothing unnatural. It is the best face cleanser I have ever used. I will buy it over and over again forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foamy, mild smelling, and works
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of my "double cleanse" routine. The smell is mild, which is important to me as I am sensitive to scents. The soap makes a thick foam that applies easily, and feels good on the skin. As far as I can tell, this does a good job of cleaning and removing the residues from my oil cleanse. I really cannot comment on if this "works" because I started all the steps of my skincare routine at the same time. But, I'm happy with this product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Zack

customer_reviews.title: Great texture!
customer_reviews.text: I love the gentle smell and texture of this face wash. I used it for the first time last night and was surprised by how far a little bit could go. I recommend squeezing out a drop no bigger than the tip of your pinky, because when you start rubbing it, it really spreads out.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It is good in that in took all the oil and any ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a Korean oil to double cleanse and followed with this foaming cleanser. It is good in that in took all the oil and any remaining makeup off; it took very little product to get my face very clean. But my oily skin began to get oilier after a few weeks, and I noticed it was drying my skin out. I changed cleansers and the problem was solved. So it didn’t really work for me but I probably don’t have the right skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Macgetticles

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the smell and how you can actually smell it without opening the bottle. The texture is creamy, very creamy. It foams very well. Unfortunately after a few uses day/night, I notice that my skin didn't take to it much. I have combination/sensitive skin, however, my dry skin doesn't come off very well with this kind of foam. I want to believe my skin brightened, but the reality is the irritation to my sensitive skin left me red more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, I would avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: It smells pleasant but it's very harsh on my face and I don't have sensitive skin (normal/oily). I'm not sure what's in it but it's a thick chemical kind of feel in your hands. Definitely gets the make up off at least and didn't break the bank, but I would definitely avoid unless your face is generally undisturbed by heavier products. I'm going to try one of their different cleansers and hope for something easier on my skin next time because I don't think the company is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good for Oily and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice clean feel to it, a squeaky clean, that I don’t really like but this one is not bad. I have acne and oily skin. I found that it worked well with my skin, since it did not break me out at all. I also felt like it lathered up pretty good to get a good clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to review this. Couldnt tell if this actually worked so I had to remove a product first and wow. I should have taken before and after pics. Makes my face very soft. My skin doesnt dry up. The dark spots from acne are almost gone. This is amazing. Would love to try ur other products.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Isadora

customer_reviews.title: Right Rice Water Cleanser for Me!!
customer_reviews.text: Gives your face a good clean feel, without the drying effect. It removes makeup and even does a good job cleaning off lil mascara residue. My skin looks dewy soft and fresh after washing with this rice water cleanser. This is a great product and purchase for me. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Lady99

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cream Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is one of several items I purchased to begin trying Korean skin care products. It's a nice, creamy cleanser which goes on like an old-fashioned cold cream, but quickly turns into a light foam when water is added. It is not drying, for me, and rinses off cleanly, without feeling that residue from the cleanser is left on the face. (I am 64, have normal skin, and am not prone to breakouts or sensitivity to cosmetics.)
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: The smell and the foaming is everything!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this twice now because I love it so much. I’ve never had a lot of problem with acne or dry skin so I just use a middle-of-the-road cleanser. This one foams up after coming out of the tube and so a little goes a long way. It also smells so good I want to eat it! This is a great product and a great deal on a face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L

customer_reviews.title: It’s A Great Makeup Remover for Combo Skin
customer_reviews.text: Well, this product is for normal skin, so if you’re oily , it will dry you out. But you can still use it! I use it only to remove my makeup, I would not recommend washing your face before applying makeup. So when I wash my face with this proxy, I can do my entire makeup routine with adds moisture. Furthermore, this product smells good and leaves me face feeling squeaky clean! I would recommend this as a makeup remover and not an everyday cleanser, unless you have normal skin because I didn’t see it do anything other than remove me makeup.
customer_reviews.author: T'Keyah Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleanser for a month now, and really like it. Only a small smear rubs into a luxurious foam that gently cleans my face. I'm 61, with 'normal' skin - neither oily nor dry. It leaves my skin feeling supple and moist. I think the tube will last a LONG time, but when it's gone I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LauraCT

customer_reviews.title: Not foamy, more like cream
customer_reviews.text: Not foamy at all. I don't know why foams are not foamy, but I don't like that. This is more like a cream.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: This face wash is fantastic! I’ve never had skin problems but recently my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This face wash is fantastic! I’ve never had skin problems but recently my skin has decided to have a total freak out. I decided I needed something better for my face than neutrogena. Bought this and noticed a difference after the very first wash. It just brightens my skin. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: It smells nice, helps remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this daily, but every other day. It can leave my skin slightly dry so I typically use it at night and followup using a moisturizing mask or cream. It smells nice, helps remove makeup, and does not lead to breakouts. A small amount goes a long way so well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: Is is rich, without clogging. Delicate scent. A little goes a long way. It moisturizes without being oily. It removes a day's worth of makeup and dirt. It leaves the skin soft and supple. Skin is not dry after cleaning or after a night's rest. Lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: hike2dtop

customer_reviews.title: Cheap as it should be
customer_reviews.text: It is good that this is cheap. It is heavily perfumed and reminds me of one of the first cleansers I tried as a teen. Maybe clearasil foaming face wash. My point is this is a very basic cleanser that could only be good for people that already have good skin. This will not help with acne, probably will make it worse.
customer_reviews.author: LVS

customer_reviews.title: Really fine product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a face washing product to put into my travel bag, and this is it. It smells great, is moisturizing, and a pea sized amount foams up and does the job. The 150 ml size lasts a long time. I really like it, and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aromasmom

customer_reviews.title: Brighten skin
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this face wash. I have been using for almost 2 years now. This face wash keeps your clean and it does not dry out your skin. If you notice most of the wash out there, it gives your skin kinda dry. But this face wash right here, it is great. It brightens your skins.
customer_reviews.author: Benballer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I am new to skin care. This is sad because I am in my thirtys. I love this cleanser. I have hit gold with this brand. It does not take much product at all to get the job done and it has a very light and pleasant scent. I will definitely purchase again when I run out... which will be awhile since a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Durham

customer_reviews.title: non drying foaming cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjuction with the cleansing oil from the same line. I am fond of both, as someone with incredibly sensitive skin, and rosacea. This works well to remove the oil from my skin, after I am done with the oil cleanser. This is foaming but without being drying and irritating. I recommend both products highly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the skin but leaves residue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash off my make up. My old cleanser was interacting with my acne medication. This does not interact with my acne medication. It foams up nicely, and you don’t have to use lots. After rinsing it off, I feel like a slight residue or something is left behind. That is the only reason why I will not be re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Super irritating
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using this cleanser. I follow the 60 second cleaning rule ( meaning I massage a cleanser on my skin for 60 seconds) and this product made my skin red, irritated, sensitive and overly stripped. I wouldn't recommend this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mckinn

customer_reviews.title: I will absolutely buy this product again!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have combination skin as so it’s very hard to find a products that works for me and I tend to be very skeptical when I find one that works, but I love this one!!! It does not leave my face oily nor dry. It’s very soothing, it does not have a strong smell and leaves my face feeling refreshed and soft, I use it every morning and night. I will absolutely buy this product again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses very well
customer_reviews.text: this foam cleanser does the job well for removing both sunscreen and anything else on your face. The 4 stars is because of the fragrance in the product; it isn't strong but I'm not a fan of it in general. I will still continue to use this until it runs out for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this face wash
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this face wash!! You now how after you wash your face it feels DRY and Tight? Well when you wash with this amazing face wash say goodbye to that feeling. This does a great job cleaning and your face feels so nice after. I loved this face wash so much that I made my sisters try it out and now they all own the same one! Koreans understand your skin, trust them!!
customer_reviews.author: GloriaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin , beware
customer_reviews.text: The first few times I loved it , I then realized it left a film on my skin it began to build up resulting in texture and spots (pimples but not full form) I stopped and returned to aha face wash and worked to remove the build up. It might be different for others but my skin type dry and it didn't work well with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: June Erceg

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and it feels good in my face!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice on my skin I felt the difference right after I wash my face with it. It's more fresh and light. Usually my skin is so sensitive like burning sensation but with this facial nothing. My skin feels so great. I'm gonna buy the set next time..
customer_reviews.author: mae

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the products that really addicted me to Korean skincare. It's a perfect second cleanse. After I use it, my skin feels clean but not tight, dry or flaky. I don't think I've ever used a face wash that worked as effectively (at least in tandem) as this has in the last ten days. My face is just super soft, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: April Vandervest

customer_reviews.title: Nice but dries skin a bit
customer_reviews.text: It feels nice, but it dries out my skin a lot. I immediately need to use a moisturizer afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to break out.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34 year old woman who has never had issues with acne ever until I started using this face wash. Coincidence? I think not. After trying to make it work as I’m on a tight budget but finally just had to pitch it. Just started using coconut oil to wash my face. I think there must be pretty toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: A bit to fragranced for me....but works well
customer_reviews.text: I like how this cleanser cleans my skin gently but, the fragrance I could do without. It is way to fragranced for me. If they cut back on the fragrance by about 90% it would be a 5 star product for me. Lasts a long time because you just need a little bit to clean your face.
customer_reviews.author: TWINKLY EYES

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Finish
customer_reviews.text: The product overall works on my skin. I used to have oily skin but with this is calms it down and leaves it very smooth with a very nice scent to it. Almost like Cherry blossoms. It very moisturizing and it has cleared my acne as well. I bought this item several time and I don’t regret buying it! I always try to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: happyhappy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it twice now following Shea Moisture’s Peace Rose Oil Sensitive Skin Oil Cleanser, and the combo feels ah-mazing. Looove. My face is softer and more moisturized than the gel face wash I was following up with before. The scent is so very light and pleasing. I’ll update if my opinion changes with continued use. But so far yay!
customer_reviews.author: Avabobava

customer_reviews.title: A big nope for dry or slightly sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry skin or easily irritated skin DON'T USE THIS. Says it leaves skin hydrated & prevents moisture loss..bruh it did the opposite. First red flag, my skin felt "squeaky clean" like literally no natural oils left on my skin. After a week of use my skin broke out worse than my teenage years.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: it is too oily
customer_reviews.text: it is too much oily and i could not feel it is finish to wash it enough. I would not order any more actually I used like kind of this style form cleansing but not exactly like it I am looking for this company old version product
customer_reviews.author: johnk

customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! I've been using this cleanser for a while now. Also, brightening isn't a bad thing. Using this cleanser just means that it will make your skin look more radiant. This cleansing foam is easy to use and gentle on my sensitive af skin. Honestly, I'm so glad I found this cleanser. It smells really nice; it doesn't irritate my skin and I'm so glad because I miss products with fragrance. This doesn't dry out your skin either. I feel like it's a product that would suit any skin type and leave it clean, bright, and calmed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been spending so much money on facial cleansers and saw this on Amazon and figured I had nothing to lose. It works great. I have dry skin and this leaves my face feeling great! It does have a wonderful fragrance which I usually don't like but I simply love this one. This is a winner for me!
customer_reviews.author: LISA FIGURA

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: It is gentle on the face and not drying, leaves skin feeling soft and silky. Rinse with cool water and you're good to go. It comes in a 5 0z bottle and a little goes a looong way so it will last quite a while. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I would pay 3 tines more for this face wash. Instant results. Your face will have absolutely no redness whatsoever. It calming and lightens scars, age spots etc !! Once you try you will buy forever
customer_reviews.author: angie2499

customer_reviews.title: Something is different!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product several times and I’ve always loved how it smelled. This time when I opened the product it smelled horrible!! Not sure it product has changed but I was so disappointed and can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: katie kelley

customer_reviews.title: NOt that great
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin dry, i used it without an oil cleanser. I am currently living in texas with the hot and humid weather, it helps prevent pimples, but kinda dry I'd say. I am in my early thirties, asian american skin, T-zone oily, sensitive skin. I probably wont use this daily, but more like every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Vu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell, very foamy
customer_reviews.text: I really love the smell and texture of this cleansers. It feels like it cleans very nicely. I have very dry skin, so its not as moisturizing as I would like it to be. I apply rice bran oil right after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My favorite facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to facial cleanser. It’s softly rose scented and has not irritated my sensitive skin. The texture is like a creamy mousse so a little bit goes a long way. It leaves my face feeling clean but not stripped of moisture. I’m just now reviewing this product but I’ve been using it for well over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: K. ragin

customer_reviews.title: Brighten up!
customer_reviews.text: Korea is known to have the best skin care products. This product works great and with an early return that it works. Definitely brightened my skin, and feels clean and refreshed after using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've used bought this a couple times already, I have combo skin but my T zone is drier than the rest of my face, I also have acne scars under my cheek bones. This cleanser doesn't do a significant amount of change in my skin except it makes my skin smoother and it's quite refreshing. I suggest this cleanser if you have I guess "normal" skin types. But if you have severe acne or severely dry skin or oily skin; I would recommend a more effective cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite face cleanser! I’ve ordered it again and again! It’s nonexpensive and really brightens my skin! It also leaves my skin feeling moistured! There is a light fragrance smell but it’s pleasant! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: kim

product_meta.title: THE FACE SHOP Rice Water Bright Foam Cleanser 150ml
